achievements.serenity.starDesc: 养了 1000 只小猫，没有丢失任何一只

achievements.veryLargeArray.desc: 无需 SETI 即可建造 100 个天文台

badges.whatYearIsIt.get: 时间悖论已被强制解决，+{0} 无效！
calendar.msg.alicorn.departed_en: {0} alicorns ascended back into the heavens.

calendar.msg.tear.spilled: {0} 滴泪水流出，化为黑烟消失。

challendge.unicornTears.label: 独角兽的眼泪
challendge.unicornTears.desc_en:
Restart the game, except unicorn-related resources are required for many things, and storage space is limited.

Goal: Obtain one necrocorn.
challendge.unicornTears.desc:
重新开始游戏，但很多事情都需要独角兽相关的资源，而存储空间有限。

目标：获得一个死灵独角兽。
challendge.unicornTears.effect.desc_en: Unicorn Tombs increase max faith (scales with transcendence tiers). Reduce the ivory price ratio for Ziggurat religion.
challendge.unicornTears.effect.desc: 独角兽墓穴增加最大信仰（随超越等级而变化）。降低金字形神塔宗教的象牙价格比率。
effectsMgr.statics.mintIvoryRatio.title: 薄荷象牙比例
effectsMgr.statics.zigguratTempleEffectP: Ziggurat Order of the Sun effect
effectsMgr.statics.oilPolicyRatio.title: 石油生产奖金
policy.dragonRelationsPhysicists.label: 龙的关系：物理学家
policy.dragonRelationsPhysicists.desc_en: Dragon physicists are experts on nuclear energy. They can help by improving your reactors.
policy.dragonRelationsPhysicists.desc: 龙族物理学家是核能专家。他们可以通过改进您的反应堆来提供帮助。
policy.dragonRelationsAstrologers.label: 龙的关系：占星家
policy.dragonRelationsAstrologers.desc_e:
The dragons have a long standing tradition of studying celestial objects. Work together with dragon astrologers to study the stars and get a look into their unique understanding of them.
Each year spent in a cycle increases starchart production
policy.dragonRelationsAstrologers.desc:
龙族有着研究天体的悠久传统。与龙族占星家一起研究星星，了解他们对星星的独特理解。
在一个周期中度过的每一年都会增加星图的产量
policy.dragonRelationsDynamicists.label: 龙的关系：动力学家
policy.dragonRelationsDynamicists.desc_e: Motion is an important concept in dragon society. For that reason they have a whole branch of scientists who study specifically locomotion and its intricacies. Dragons can improve your varying forms of travel.
policy.dragonRelationsDynamicists.desc: 运动是龙族社会的一个重要概念。因此，龙族拥有一大批专门研究运动及其复杂性的科学家。龙可以改善您的各种旅行方式。
policy.griffinRelationsMetallurgists.des: Griffins have a very good understanding of steelmaking and its intricate processes. Their metallurgists can help you by improving steel plants.
狮鹫对炼钢及其复杂工艺有着深入的了解。他们的冶金学家可以帮助您改进钢铁厂。
policy.griffinRelationsScouts.label: 狮鹫关系：童子军
policy.griffinRelationsScouts.desc_en: Flight is very beneficial when looking for game. Propose collaborating with griffin scouts during hunts to improve its effectiveness.
policy.griffinRelationsScouts.desc: 飞行在寻找猎物时非常有用。建议在狩猎期间与狮鹫侦察兵合作以提高其效率。
policy.griffinRelationsMachinists.label: 狮鹫关系：机械师
policy.griffinRelationsMachinists.desc_e: Griffins understand aerodynamics well and their machinists can improve your steamworks effectiveness.
policy.griffinRelationsMachinists.desc: 狮鹫非常了解空气动力学，他们的机械师可以提高您的蒸汽机的效率。
policy.nagaRelationsArchitects.label: 纳迦关系: 建筑师
policy.nagaRelationsArchitects.desc_en:
Naga architects know some unique building techniques kittens do not possess, come to a trade agreement with them to obtain blueprints and study them.

Building Naga embassies will increase the chance to get blueprints from nagas by 0.25%, by up to 10%. Once the maximum bonus is achieved, they will improve the blueprint crafting ratio instead
policy.nagaRelationsArchitects.desc:
纳迦建筑师知道一些小猫不具备的独特建筑技术，与他们达成贸易协议以获取蓝图并进行研究。

建造纳加大使馆将增加从纳加获得蓝图的机会 0.25%，最高可达 10%。一旦达到最大奖励，他们就会提高蓝图制作比率
policy.nagaRelationsMasons.label: 纳迦关系：共济会
policy.nagaRelationsMasons.desc_en: Nagas almost exclusively use minerals as building materials, so they have a lot of experience extracting and processing it. They can show you the secrets of efficiently crafting slabs using quarries.
policy.nagaRelationsMasons.desc: 纳迦人几乎只使用矿物作为建筑材料，因此他们在开采和加工矿物方面拥有丰富的经验。他们可以向您展示如何高效地利用采石场制作石板的秘诀。
policy.nagaRelationsCultists.label: 纳迦关系：邪教徒
policy.nagaRelationsCultists.desc_en:
Nagas have very different religious traditions. Study naga cultist rituals and employ them during religious services.
Ziggurats will now be slightly affected by Order of the Sun upgrades.
policy.nagaRelationsCultists.desc:
纳迦有着截然不同的宗教传统。研究纳迦教派仪式并在宗教仪式中使用它们。
金字形神塔现在会受到太阳教团升级的轻微影响。
policy.lizardRelationsDiplomats.label: 蜥蜴关系：外交官
policy.lizardRelationsDiplomats.desc_en:
Lizards are a peaceful race. If you want to befriend the races of Cath, they are more than willing to contribute.
Each embassy with any race will now grant a 0.04% culture bonus, up to 15%.
policy.lizardRelationsDiplomats.desc:
蜥蜴人是爱好和平的种族。如果你想与 Cath 的种族交朋友，他们非常愿意做出贡献。
现在每个任何种族的大使馆都会提供 0.04% 的文化奖励，最高可达 15%。
policy.lizardRelationsEcologists.label: 蜥蜴关系：生态学家
policy.lizardRelationsEcologists.desc_en: The lizards love nature and want to protect it. Their ecologists are experts on preventing pollution and at low pollution levels they can tune some of your green energy buildings, increasing their effectiveness.
policy.lizardRelationsEcologists.desc: 蜥蜴热爱大自然并希望保护它。他们的生态学家是防止污染的专家，在污染程度较低时，他们可以调整一些绿色能源建筑，提高其效率。
policy.lizardRelationsPriests.label: 蜥蜴关系：牧师
policy.lizardRelationsPriests.desc_en:
The lizards share the kittens' love of the sun. Their priests would be happy to help The Order of the Sun.
Manuscripts will grant a small bonus to faith.
policy.lizardRelationsPriests.desc:
蜥蜴与小猫一样热爱太阳。它们的牧师很乐意帮助太阳教团。
手稿将为信仰带来小幅加成。
policy.scientificCommunism.label: 科学共产主义
policy.scientificCommunism.desc_en: Increases all effects of Socialism by 25%
policy.scientificCommunism.desc: 使社会主义的所有效果提高 25%
policy.sharkRelationsBotanists.label: 鲨鱼关系：植物学家
policy.sharkRelationsBotanists.desc_en: The sharks cultivate a lot of catnip, so their botanists have a good understanding of it. Collaborate with them to study and improve catnip refinement and conversion processes.
policy.sharkRelationsBotanists.desc: 鲨鱼养殖了大量猫薄荷，因此它们的植物学家对猫薄荷非常了解。与他们合作研究和改进猫薄荷的提炼和转化过程。
policy.sharkRelationsScribes.label: 鲨鱼关系：抄写员
policy.sharkRelationsScribes.desc_en: The shark scribes are keen on recording Cath's history and you can help each other in the form of a trade deal. If you give them more resources in trade, they are willing to share more of their recordings.
policy.sharkRelationsScribes.desc: 鲨鱼抄写员热衷于记录 Cath 的历史，你们可以通过交易的方式互相帮助。如果你在交易中给他们更多的资源，他们就会愿意分享更多的记录。
policy.sharkRelationsMerchants.label: 鲨鱼关系：商人
policy.sharkRelationsMerchants.desc_en:
The sharks are experts of traveling through water, but not so much on land. Work together with their merchants to discover and share trade routes through water and land.
The more you trade, the more effective it becomes
policy.sharkRelationsMerchants.desc:
鲨鱼擅长在水中旅行，但在陆地上却不太擅长。与他们的商人合作，发现并分享水陆贸易路线。
交易越多，效率就越高
policy.spiderRelationsGeologists.label: 蜘蛛关系：地质学家
policy.spiderRelationsGeologists.desc_en:
The spiders are willing to help you find and exploit good mineral deposits in exchange for your continued partnership.
Each embassy you have with spiders will improve your mining industry by 0.2%, up to a maximum of 15%
policy.spiderRelationsGeologists.desc:
蜘蛛愿意帮助你寻找和开采优质矿藏，以换取你继续合作。
每个有蜘蛛的大使馆都会提高你的采矿业 0.2%，最高可达 15%
policy.spiderRelationsChemists.label: 蜘蛛关系：化学家
policy.spiderRelationsChemists.desc_en:
While spiders have abundant oil, they do not have the means to create kerosene yet. Your chemists can help them study chemical processes.

Spiders will now sell kerosene
policy.spiderRelationsChemists.desc:
虽然蜘蛛拥有丰富的石油，但它们还没有办法制造煤油。你的化学家可以帮助他们研究化学过程。

蜘蛛现在将出售煤油
policy.spiderRelationsPaleontologists.de: Paleontology is the study of ancient life through fossil records. The spider paleontologists can help you discover these fossils. They can also give you a better understanding of how and where oil was formed, improving the oil industry
古生物学是通过化石记录研究古代生命的一门学科。蜘蛛古生物学家可以帮助你发现这些化石。他们还可以让你更好地了解石油是如何形成的以及在哪里形成的，从而改善石油工业
religion.sacrificeBtn.sacrifice.msg.over: {0} tears spilled, vanishing into black smoke.
{0} 滴泪水流出，化为黑烟消失。

village.census.exp.desc: 小猫通过工作来获得经验。
village.census.exp.notready_en: Not enough exp to do anything special.
village.census.exp.notready: 没有足够的经验来做任何特别的事情。
village.census.exp.ready_en: You can spend some exp and gold to promote this kitten.
village.census.exp.ready: 你可以花费一些经验和金币来培养这只小猫。
village.census.no.kittens.filtered_en: None of the kittens match this filter.
village.census.no.kittens.filtered: 没有一只小猫符合该过滤条件。
